Articles.Content:
Hello, I\'ve been playing KSP a few weeks and find it awesome!

I don\'t know the maths as yet but I can learn it, so will get there soon.

Anyway howdydo!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Thanks!

I am getting to know tis better and have a basic design for a launch vehcle (got to escape carrying small CSM), any tips on massive rockets?

...any tips on massive rockets?

Yes, massive isn\'t always better. 8)

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

any tips on massive rockets?

Struts.

Struts.

Lots and lots of struts

More boosters!

..means you need more fuel. Which means you need more boosters and fuel to carry the fuel. And so on.

Keep it simple.

Make sure everything is bolted on tight, too.
Hello welcome to the fourms.

Welcome to the forums!

Hope you don\'t fail as much as me!

JupiterII

any tips on massive rockets?

Don\'t
so what sort of rocket would you use as a haevy lifter?
Welcome. I actually thought this post was a suggestion. We need a Kerbal Countdown in game

Struts.

Struts, duct tape and duct-taped struts.
A countdown clock is a great idea, and welcome to the addiction of your life.

Struts, duct tape and duct-taped struts.

I\'ll upload them to my mod some time today I think. I actually have duct tape already. ;P

Now we see the true might of the Kerbal Space Program!

Only we dare to use a countadown to launch a rocket to the moon that is held together only by...

...Duct tape.

;D

I\'ll upload them to my mod some time today I think. I actually have duct tape already. ;P

You have duct tape? That, my friend, is WIN, and the true Kerbal way.

It is also the Minmatarian way, but I\'m starting to think that they are so similar that the Minmatar are just the decendents of Kerbals..

Of course only like 5 of you are going to get that joke, or this one:

The Amarrians pray to their gods.

The Gallente pray for peace.

The Caldari pray for profit.

The Minmatarians pray that the duct tape holds and their ships dont fall apart.

Duct tape

The only thing doctor Bunsen Honeydue has considered too useful to modify.

You have duct tape? That, my friend, is WIN, and the true Kerbal way.

It is also the Minmatarian way, but I\'m starting to think that they are so similar that the Minmatar are just the decendents of Kerbals..

Of course only like 5 of you are going to get that joke, or this one:

The Gallente pray for peace.

The Caldari pray for profit.

The Minmatarians pray that the duct tape holds and their ships dont fall apart.

Was salvaging this wreck the other day for over an hour when it finally started shooting at me! Turns out it was a minmatar ship =P

LOLOLOL thats fuuuny

Duct tape

The only thing doctor Bunsen Honeydue has considered too useful to modify.
Sorry Beaker.

Spore? Or no?

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
